title: Fps lag after new launcher update 2016
body: Before the update everything was normally. I didnt have any problems with fps in game starting or while in game but after the update Im waiting 30 seconds to open my accaunt. When im starting a game Im waiting a 20 seconds to take me in champ select and u know everyone takes the lanes and I need to play supp :@ but in game is the same like before the new launcher.  Did anyone know how to take back to the old launcher; ( ... And if its possible to play with the old launcher forever..

replies.body:
Based on the context here it sounds more like you're having a connection issue than fps, especially if you're having problems before the game starts.  Are you using any third party programs like play.tv, overlays, etc?  They may be causing you problems here, and I recommend removing them.  

For now you can return to the legacy client in the login screen.  There is an option just below the sign in button.  You'll need to get this fixed up eventually, because you won't be able to use the legacy client forever.  Don't ever play yourself.

The client works fine in everything but champion select, it slows down way too much even without anything else open, not everyone can afford a good computer. Will there be a way to turn of absolutely every animation in champion select? so it runs faster? Right now it can take a while to get a champ and change masteries - rune pages while in champ select. (There is an animation turn off button but that doesn't help much)

Unfortunately, I don't have visibility on this.  You'll want to post this feedback over to the client devs on the [Client Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).  Good luck!
I forgot to say (I DIDNT WANT ANOTHER COMPUTER I DONT HAVE MONEY FOR ANOTHER ONE DJ KHALED IS THE BEST)
